name: Vile Aspirant
items: trident, hide armor, wooden shield (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6)

passive.name: Tainted Rage :f:
passive.trigger: The vile aspirant is Bloodied for the first time in the battle;
passive.effect: The vile aspirant enters a rage and gains 6 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute. While raging, the vile aspirant deals +2 additional damage with melee weapon and unarmed attacks, has a -1 penalty to AC, and cannot <action>Raise a Shield</action> or use actions that have the concentrate trait. The vile aspirant can still Seek while raging.

offense.name: Raise a Shield :a:
offense.description: The vile aspirant raises their shield, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of their next turn.
